text: “allah pahala karana lada dæya (dharmaya) desatada, (ohuge) dutaya desatada, pæminenu” yayi kiyanu læbuvahot “apage mutun mittan kumak mata sitiyodæyi api dutuvemuda, eyama (api anugamanaya kirima) apata pramanavatya” yayi pavasannaha. ovunge mutun mittan kisivak nodænagena rju margayehi nomætiva sitiyat vuvada, (ovun tama mutun mittanva anugamanaya karanne)
